meanings.definition: Teach (a person or group) to accept a set of beliefs uncritically.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was indoctrinating the students with the importance of recycling.
meanings.sent2: The cult leader was indoctrinating his followers with his radical ideas.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was indoctrinating the other birds with its favorite song.
meanings.sent4: The hypnotist was indoctrinating the audience with his mesmerizing words.
meanings.sent5: The chef was indoctrinating the apprentice with the secret recipe for the famous dish.
